review: The accessibility to Dr.Sapra is worth a million bucks! We have never had any issues getting our kids in when they need to see him and have always felt very confident in his care. He has a very knowledgeable and friendly. I would recommend this to anyone looking for a pediatrician.

tags: Doctor friendliness,Explanation of the health issue,Treatment satisfaction,Value for money,Wait time,
review: Booked a video time with him based on Practo reviews. Unfortunately, We had  a disappointing experience with Doctor. It felt like our appointment was rushed, and he seemed more interested in finishing quickly than addressing our concerns. The lack of attention made us feel unheard, and we left with unresolved questions. Overall, not a satisfactory visit.Do not recommend at all.
